title: "demo_ETH_HIA_2025"
output: html_document

```{r}

library(healthiar)

attr_deaths <-
  attribute_health(
    exp_central = 10,
    cutoff_central = 5,
    bhd_central = 62642,
    rr_central = 1.062,
    rr_lower = 1.040,
    rr_upper = 1.083,
    rr_increment = 10,
    erf_shape = "log_linear",
    info = "pm2.5_deaths"
  )

attr_deaths$health_main |>
  dplyr::select(impact_rounded, exp, bhd, rr, erf_ci, pop_fraction) |>  print()

```
